qas.question: Name one child from the union of Tony and Joan?
What is the name of the middle school that Madonna attended?
Madonna achieved a name for herself in school by her unusual behavior and also for what other reason?

context: In 1966, Tony married the family's housekeeper <a0_0>Joan Gustafson<a0_0/>; they had two children, Jennifer (born 1967) and <a1_0>Mario<a1_0/> (born <a2_0>1968<a2_0/>). At this point, Madonna started to resent him for decades, and developed a rebellious attitude. She attended St. Frederick's and St. Andrew's Catholic Elementary Schools, and <a3_0>West Middle School<a3_0/>. Madonna was known for her <a4_0>high grade point average<a4_0/>, and achieved notoriety for her unconventional behavior. She would perform cartwheels and handstands in the hallways between classes, dangle by her knees from the monkey bars during recess, and pull up her skirt during class—all so that the boys could see her underwear.
